content.raw:
The problem I have is in the spawning process, if you uncomment [these three lines](#!/osrf/gzweb/pull-requests/110/scene-test/diff#Ltest/gzscene_test.jsT370) you would have an error about updatestats of undefined, I believe this might have sth to do with entity selected, it would be cool if you would have a hint or idea to solve the model spawning .


Update:
I've moved the model spawning to a different branch, [here](https://bitbucket.org/mohamd_ayman/gzweb/branch/test_model_spawning)

@chapulina @iche033
